name: Tuna Mac
author: melissa loudy
summary: An easy casserole using mac-n-cheese from a box with a can of tuna, mushrooms, and bread crumbs on top.
ingredients: 1 (7.25 ounce) package macaroni and cheese dinner mix
¼ cup margarine, cut into pieces
1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring water to boil in a saucepan
Cook macaroni at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender, 7 to 8 minutes; drain
Stir cheese sauce mixture from the packet, margarine, and milk into the macaroni until the margarine melts and the macaroni is evenly coated in sauce
Pour macaroni mixture into a small casserole dish; top with bread crumbs
Bake in preheated oven until hot, about 30 minutes
